title: Kevin Durant, Steelers, Dak Prescott, Eagles, and the Patriots
itunes:title: Kevin Durant, Steelers, Dak Prescott, Eagles, and the Patriots
description:
Colin discusses why he feels Golden State Warriors F Kevin Durant is jealous of Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James, the Pittsburgh Steelers still talking about the past, what the Dallas Cowboys should do with QB Dak Prescott, why the Philadelphia Eagles are being smart with QB Carson Wentz, and why New England Patriots HC Bill Belichick and QB Tom Brady are starting to get along again. Guests include Nick Wright, Albert Breer, Rob Parker, and Stephen Jackson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
